column1: #Text=is part of the state of Arizona , in the United States of America .
#Text=It is a complex region of remarkable cultural , geological and scenic diversity despite its sparse population .
#Text=Interstate 40 , following the route of the old Route 66 , runs along the northern edge of this region , and I-10 through its southern area .
#Text=There are no major airports in the region ; the closest airports with significant commercial service are in Phoenix and Tucson .
#Text=A car is essential as there is no public transportation .
#Text=, 418 East Main St , Springerville ( museum and visitor center ) ( near Springerville ) , ☏ +1 928-333-5375 , ✉ casa@springervilleaz.gov .
#Text=An ancient pueblo archaeological site , with remains of an astronomical calendar , a great kiva , stairs , and petroglyphs .
#Text=Tours start from the museum in Springerville . $ 10 ( adults ) , $ 8 ( seniors ) , $ 5 ( children under 18 ) .
#Text=This park contains well-preserved Salado cliff dwellings , Guided tours to the Upper Cliff Dwellings are offered from Nov-Apr ; reservations required ( tel . 928-467-2241 ) .
#Text=A museum and bookshop are on-site . $ 3 ( adults ) , free ( children under 16 ) .
#Text=The largest natural travertine bridge in the world . $ 5 ( adults 14+ ) , $ 2 ( youth 7-13 ) , free ( child 0-6 ) .
#Text=Walking tours and lectures are held here , along with occasional photography workshops . $ 9 ( adults ) , $ 4.50 ( children 5-12 ) .
#Text=This 288-acre National Historic District encompasses the remains of Fort Apache , as well as Kinishba Ruins , a sprawling Zuni and Hope site abandoned around 1400 CE .
#Text=Also on site is the White Mountain Apache Cultural Center and Museum . $ 5 ( adults ) , $ 3 ( seniors ) , free ( children under 7 ) .
#Text=A deep river canyon , managed by the Tonto National Forest .
#Text=There are no maintained trails , although the wilderness can be visited anytime .
#Text=There are 27 sets of rapids and many side creeks , and white-water rafting and kayaking is popular during the spring .
#Text=From March 1 - May 15 river-running permits are required ; group size is limited to 15 people .
